name: df-sigagen
body: |- wceq(csigagen, cmpt(s0, universe, cint(crab(s1, cfv(csiga, cuni(cv(s0))), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ sigaGen =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ ⋂ { s1 ∈(sigAlgebra ` ⋃ s0)| s0 ⊆ s1 })
comment: Define the sigma-algebra generated by a given collection of sets as the intersection of all sigma-algebra containing that set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Dec-2016.)
